`,(0,s.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{children:(0,s.jsxDEV)(e.code,{className:"language-cpp",children:`#include <iostream>\r
#include <vector>\r
using namespace std;\r
\r
int N, M, m[101], c;\r
vector<vector<int> > dp;\r
\r
int main()\r
{\r
	ios::sync_with_stdio(false);\r
	cin.tie(0);\r
	cout.tie(0);\r
\r
	cin >> N >> M;\r
	for (int i = 1; i <= N; i++)\r
		cin >> m[i];\r
	dp.resize(N + 1, vector<int>(10001, 0));\r
\r
	for (int i = 1; i <= N; i++)\r
	{\r
		cin >> c;\r
\r
		for (int j = 0; j <= 10000; j++)\r
		{\r
			dp[i][j] = dp[i - 1][j];\r
			if (j >= c)\r
				dp[i][j] = max(dp[i][j], dp[i - 1][j - c] + m[i]);\r
		}\r
	}\r
\r
	for (int j = 0; j <= 10000; j++)\r
	{\r
		if (dp[N][j] >= M)\r
		{\r
			cout << j;\r
			return 0;\r
		}\r
	}\r
\r
